plain_text:
United States Court of Appeals
                     For the First Circuit


No. 09-1705

                         UNITED STATES,

                            Appellee,

                               v.

                          JAMES DAMON,

                      Defendant, Appellant.


                          ERRATA SHEET

     The opinion of this Court issued on February 18, 2010, is
amended as follows:

     On page 8, line 4, "2006" should be replaced with "2005".
